rukus.text: O you who believe! Let not your wealth nor your children (distract and) divert you from the remembrance of God. Those who do so, they are the losers

And spend (in Godâ€™s cause and for the needy) out of whatever We provide for you before death comes to any of you and he says: "My Lord! If only You would grant me respite for a short while, so that I may give alms, and be one of the righteous
But never will God grant respite to a soul when its appointed term has come. God is fully aware of all that you do
